CustomField.description: Formula derived from the Billing Frequency
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(RC_Advance_Payment_Term_SOS__c), "Monthly in Advance","1", "Monthly in Arrears","1", "Quarterly in Advance","3", "Quarterly in Arrears","3", "Half yearly in Advance","6", "Half yearly in Arrears","6", "Yearly in Advance","12", "Yearly in Arrears","12", "" )
CustomField.label: Billing Frequency
